title: What the actual F.
body:
My internet dropped out as I was playing mid game. I came back to a message saying I have been placed in a lower priority queue 'for CONSTANTLY being AFK or leaving games' (Uhm?, it was one game) and now I must wait 20 minutes to play a single game? 
So people who troll and flame all game are free to do it as much as they like and get no penalties but god forbid my internet drop out even once.
Is there any way to get out of this thing?

replies.body:
The lowest variant of penalty that Leavebuster can give you is the five-minute low priority queue. If it started off by giving you a twenty-minute low priority queue, then something's terribly off. Either you've been punished in the past or there was a genuine glitch in the system, not the mention the fact that this is apparently the first game you've left (leaving one game will not punish you; you're right about that).

Make a support ticket and ask Riot to review your case. Also, I suggest changing your password, as it's possible that someone else is playing on your account.
I make it an issue to never leave no matter how bad things get which is why I don't get why I'm being so harshly penalized for this.
That's unusual, have you left any other games recently? Usually if it's just a one off it shouldn't give you a low priority queue penalty.
